content:
I recall discussing the member ID field a few ballot reconciliation calls ago: what the format should be and whether it even needing to be required...

Does anyone know what the outcome of that discussion was? As I recall, I'd mentioned that CMS had never offered the field in our API and it didn't seem to be a strong request from API users. I wasn't able to join the screenshare that day, though, so I'm unclear where things went from there.

Anyone know the ticket and/or outcome for this issue?
I think the discussion was in the context of including member IDs on EOBs?
(Though similar issues apply to the CARIN Patient profile, as well.)
